title: T332 Helmar Stamps & Cigarette Box - SOLD!

posts.post_title: T332 Helmar Stamps & Cigarette Box - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Only Hartley and the box remain - $25 for both, please - SOLD!!


Hi!

I found these stamps & box at a garage sale - I NEVER find ANYTHING good at garage sales, but I STILL stop at 'em because "Hey, You Never Know!"

Anyway, I don't collect 'em, but if you are reading my gibberish, you might!

I would like $18 each or $75 for the Lot, delivered, PayPal FF, please.  (If I am WAY out of line with my asking price, please let me know!  Ebay prices seem to be "all over the place!)

THANKS for your interest!

Only a couple of them are left - grab 'em before they head off to eBay!

THANKS!
